name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
summary: BeyBlade: Metal Fusion is a Wii and DS entry of the BeyBlade spinning battle top series, released only in the United States.

alternative_names.name: Metal Fight Beyblade: Bakutan Cyber Pegasus

esrb.synopsis: This is an action game based on the TV show Beyblade, in which players use mechanical tops to compete against a variety of opponents. Players send their tops ("Beyblades") into an arena to knock out other Beylades. Damage is indicated by depleting life meters and brief explosions.
